snippet: PETERS--Margery Antle (nee Watson), age 92, died at home in New York on January 28, 2016. Born in Colorado, raised in California, she moved to Manhattan in the 1940s, married and was a corporate wife and mother. In later life she became Director of the Library of the General Society of Mechanics and Tradesmen in New York, retiring in 1997. She was a world traveler, a beachcomber and a gracious friend. Survivors include her brother, K.G., her daughters, Nancy and Carol and her son-in-law, Paul. 1/3
lead_paragraph: PETERS--Margery Antle (nee Watson), age 92, died at home in New York on January 28, 2016. Born in Colorado, raised in California, she moved to Manhattan in the 1940s, married and was a corporate wife and mother. In later life she became Director of the Library of the General Society of Mechanics and Tradesmen in New York, retiring in 1997. She was a world traveler, a beachcomber and a gracious friend. Survivors include her brother, K.G., her daughters, Nancy and Carol and her son-in-law, Paul. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  PETERS, MARGERY ANTLE (NEE WATSON)
